titles.title: Recognizing and celebrating the 35th anniversary of Guadalupe Mountains National Park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 9/19/2007--Introduced. Recognizes and celebrates the 35th anniversary of the founding of the Guadalupe Mountains National Park. Honors the National Park Service (NPS) for its service to the Guadalupe Mountains region and the Guadalupe Mountains National Park.
